title: Mobile-Based Clinical Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Understanding of Statistical Concepts
context.additional_context: A post-COVID-19 course to strengthen clinical data analysis and medication calculation skills under limited face-to-face education, ensuring smartphone-centered accessibility.

learning_goals: Learners solve clinical scenario-based medication dosage calculation problems with 90% accuracy.
Learners interpret medical statistical data to extract means, standard deviations, and confidence intervals.
Learners complete self-directed learning modules for at least 150 minutes per week in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
